cast.overview: During the 1972 elections, two reporters' investigation sheds light on the controversial Watergate scandal that compels President Nixon to resign from his post.
cast.title: All the President's Men

cast.overview: An ex-mercenary turned smuggler. A Mende fisherman. Amid the explosive civil war overtaking 1999 Sierra Leone, these men join for two desperate missions: recovering a rare pink diamond of immense value and rescuing the fisherman's son, conscripted as a child soldier into the brutal rebel forces ripping a swath of torture and bloodshed countrywide.
cast.title: Blood Diamond

details.biography: Stephen Weaver Collins (born October 1, 1947) is an American former actor and writer. He's best known for his roles as Eric Camden on the WB/CW television series 7th Heaven (1996-2007), Dayton King on the ABC series No Ordinary Family, Gene Porter in the NBC series Revolution, and Commander Willard Decker in the 1979 film Star Trek: The Motion Picture.
details.name: Stephen Collins
